message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product. I think you'll really love it!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer! I'm really interested, but $90 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend.  How about $75?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. However, I've got to make a profit on this deal. How about we meet in the middle at $82.50?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $82.50 is still a bit high for me.  How about we split the difference and go with $80?
